item.title: DragonSoft Released. Dungeoneering + Summoning, Much more
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“Python_, post:4, topic:401809”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=498868.msg3648173#msg3648173 date=1309540093]
Did you fix those memory leaks that’s added in most DSPK servers?

Looks great, but that place where you kill NPCs to get charms looks too crowded.
[/quote]

I’m not positive, but I’m pretty sure someone released the original DSPK with memory leak fixed, and the old one was taken down.
And looks nice. Are the Summoning NPC’s clipped?[/quote]

i dont think it was actually fully fixed

Read full topic
